Posts.EditableText:
I've been gone a while.  I didn't intend to leave, I just drifted away from the forum.  I come back, and Zelimos and davidw are still fighting.  How ironic.

So I decided I'd make one last post, just to tell you guys that I am going, and it's for good this time.  See ya!
